title: Ticketing Platform
description: A fully featured purchase path for a prestigious theatre based in London, UK. Includes - select seats from a seatmap, display events in a calendar, add items to a basket, checkout, process payment
contributions: Created and implemented a reuseable front-end component library
Performed accessibility audits to ensure WCAG were met

title: Museum / Booking
description: A sleek Vue/Nuxt SPA that uses a REST API to serve WordPress content to the front-end. Also includes an event, calendar, and booking system.
contributions: Created and implemented a reuseable front-end component library
Performed accessibility audits to ensure WCAG were met

title: Moving Company
description: A WordPress website for a local moving company. Includes a live support chat, request a quote features, and much more.
contributions: Created everything on site and managed updates until mid 2019

title: Real Estate / Booking
description: A WordPress website for a local rental business. Includes a system to display all of the client's properties, with booking information and links.
contributions: Worked alongside our design team to ensure pixel-perfect design implementation
Handled the entirety of front-end development
